item.title: vRealize Automation 6.1 (formally vCloud Automation Center) – Identity Appliance – Deployment / Configuration
item.description: The introduction of Single Sign On (SSO) in vSphere 5.1 has provided a new major dependency of the infrastructure. SSO provides a secure way of authenticating to your vSphere environment. It not only serves as an authentication broker but also a token exchange, so what does this all mean you? In a nutshell this is a handshake.
